items.sentence: Tom came home from school early today because he wasn't feeling well.
I didn't have a chance to tell Tom that that needed to be done today.
I wasn't able to sell any of the stuff Tom wanted me to sell for him.
Tom said he had to wait in line for three hours to buy these tickets.
Tom told Mary that she should learn how to play a musical instrument.
I wish I'd spent more time training my dog when he was still a puppy.
Have you ever wished that you could spend more time with your family?
Judging from how the sky looks, there could be a downpour any moment.
If I were going to buy a boat, what kind of boat would you recommend?
In spite of the depression, the prices of commodities are still high.
